item.title: This Week in Threats: Feb 03–Feb 17, 2026
item.description: 4 new CISA KEV vulnerabilities this week. Highest CVSS: 9.8. Review the latest threats added to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities catalog.

item.title: Agentic AI Is the #1 Cybersecurity Threat in 2026. Here's How It Maps to Your Security+ Exam.
item.description: Agentic AI represents an unprecedented cybersecurity threat in 2026. Learn how autonomous AI agents create new attack vectors and how these threats map directly to Security+ SY0-701 exam domains.
